question_text: Which of the following are characteristics of a user-swappable laptop battery? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Easily accessible from the outside of the laptop
Usually requires a screwdriver for removal
May include a release latch or button
Can be replaced without professional tools
correct_answer: Easily accessible from the outside of the laptop
May include a release latch or button
Can be replaced without professional tools
explanation: User-swappable batteries are designed to be quickly removed and replaced without technical expertise.
